targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ts,
  (
    CASE
      WHEN (msg ->> 'mag1_fwhm_corr') :: REAL > 0 THEN (msg ->> 'mag1_fwhm_corr') :: REAL
      ELSE NULL
    END
  ) as Baade,
  (
    CASE
      WHEN (msg ->> 'mag2_fwhm_corr') :: REAL > 0 THEN (msg ->> 'mag2_fwhm_corr') :: REAL
      ELSE NULL
    END
  ) as Clay,
  (
    CASE
      WHEN (msg ->> 'dimm_fwhm_corr') :: REAL > 0 THEN (msg ->> 'dimm_fwhm_corr') :: REAL
      ELSE NULL
    END
  ) as DIMM
FROM
  telem
WHERE
  device = 'tcsi'
  and ec = 'telem_telsee'
  and ts >= $__timeFrom()
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()
  AND (
    (msg ->> 'mag1_fwhm_corr') :: REAL > 0
    OR (msg ->> 'mag2_fwhm_corr') :: REAL > 0
    OR (msg ->> 'dimm_fwhm_corr') :: REAL > 0
  )
ORDER BY
  ts DESC

SELECT
  ts,
  (msg->>'wind')::float as windspeed
FROM
  telem
WHERE
  device = 'tcsi'
  and ec = 'telem_telenv'
  and ts >= $__timeFrom()
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY
  ts ASC

select
  ts,
  CASE
    when (msg ->> 'observing') :: bool = true THEN (msg ->> 'obsName')
    Else Null
  end as observing
from
  telem
where
  device = 'observers'
  and ts between $__timeFrom()
  AND $__timeTo();

with target as (select
  ts,
  CASE
    WHEN msg ->> 'catObj' = 'UNKNOWN'
    OR msg ->> 'catObj' = 'Pointing'
    OR msg ->> 'catObj' LIKE '%***%' THEN NULL
    ELSE msg ->> 'catObj'
  END as object,
  (SELECT DISTINCT ON (tcsitelem.ts) msg->>'domeStat'
    FROM telem as tcsitelem
    WHERE telem.device = 'tcsi'
   	and ec = 'telem_teldata'
   	AND tcsitelem.ts between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() 
    AND tcsitelem.ts <= telem.ts
    ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1) as val
from
  telem
where
  device = 'tcsi'
  AND ec = 'telem_telcat'
  and ts between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() 
)
select ts, CASE WHEN val = '1' then object else null end as object from target;

select
  ts,
  case when msg->>'domeStat' = '1' then 'open' when  msg->>'domeStat' = '-1' then 'changing' else null end as domeStat
from
  telem
where
  device = 'tcsi'
  AND ec = 'telem_teldata'
  and ts between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo();

SELECT
  ts,
  CASE WHEN msg->>'presetName' IS NOT NULL THEN msg ->> 'presetName' ELSE NULL END as fwsci1
FROM
  telem
WHERE
  ec = 'telem_stage'
  AND ts BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND device = 'fwsci1';

SELECT
  ts,
  CASE WHEN msg->>'presetName' IS NOT NULL THEN msg ->> 'presetName' ELSE NULL END as fwsci2
FROM
  telem
WHERE
  ec = 'telem_stage'
  AND ts BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND device = 'fwsci2';

SELECT
  ts,
  CASE
    WHEN msg ->> 'presetName' IS NOT NULL
    AND msg ->> 'presetName' != 'none' THEN msg ->> 'presetName'
    ELSE NULL
  END as scibs
FROM
  telem
WHERE
  ec = 'telem_stage'
  AND ts BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND device = 'stagescibs';

SELECT
  ts,
  CASE
    WHEN msg ->> 'presetName' IS NOT NULL
    AND msg ->> 'presetName' != 'none' THEN msg ->> 'presetName'
    ELSE NULL
  END as wfs
FROM
  telem
WHERE
  ec = 'telem_stage'
  AND ts BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND device = 'stagebs';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() ;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() ;

SELECT DISTINCT
  msg->>'exptime' as exptime,
  msg->>'fps' as fps,
  msg->>'emGain' as emGain
FROM telem WHERE
  device = 'camsci1' and 
  ts between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() AND 
  msg->>'exptime' is not null
;

SELECT DISTINCT
  msg->>'exptime' as exptime,
  msg->>'fps' as fps,
  msg->>'emGain' as emGain
FROM telem WHERE
  device = 'camsci2' and 
  ts between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() AND 
  msg->>'exptime' is not null
;

SELECT DISTINCT
  msg->>'exptime' as exptime,
  msg->>'fps' as fps,
  msg->>'emGain' as emgain
FROM telem WHERE
  device = 'camwfs' and 
  ts between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() AND 
  msg->>'exptime' is not null
;
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%camsci1_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%camsci2_%.xrif';

WITH 
  obs AS (
    SELECT
    ts,
    (msg->>'observing')::bool as observing,
    msg->>'email' as email,
    msg->>'obsName' as obsName,
    msg->>'tgt_name' as tgt_name
    FROM telem
    WHERE
    device = 'observers' AND
    msg->>'obsName' != ''
    ORDER BY ts DESC
  ),
  edges AS (
    SELECT 
      ts,
      observing,
      LAG(ts) OVER (ORDER BY ts DESC),
      LAG(observing) OVER (ORDER BY ts DESC) AS next_paired_observing,
      email,
      obsName,
      tgt_name
    FROM obs
  ),
  transitions AS (
		SELECT ts, email, obsName, tgt_name, next_paired_observing as observing FROM edges WHERE observing != next_paired_observing
	),
  spans AS (
    SELECT
      ts,
      LAG(ts) OVER (ORDER BY ts DESC) AS next_edge_ts,
    	email,
	    obsName,
      observing,
      tgt_name
    FROM transitions
	)
SELECT
	ts as start_ts,
  next_edge_ts as end_ts,
  email,
  tgt_name,
  obsName
FROM spans
WHERE 
	observing = true AND
    (
        tstzrange(ts, next_edge_ts) && 
        tstzrange($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    )
ORDER BY ts DESC;
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%camflowfs_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%camllowfs_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%camwfs_%.xrif';

SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND 
origin_path NOT LIKE '%camlowfs_%.xrif' AND
origin_path NOT LIKE '%camwfs_%.xrif' AND
origin_path NOT LIKE '%camsci1_%.xrif' AND
origin_path NOT LIKE '%camsci2_%.xrif';

options.content:
# Retrieve an arbitrary metric time-series

```
>>> from magaox import db
>>> db.metric('tcsi', 'dimm_fwhm_corr', start='${__from:date}', end='${__to:date}')
[{'ts': ..., 'dimm_fwhm_corr': ...}, ...]
```
